text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump “During a Feb. 28, 2020, campaign rally in South Carolina, President Donald Trump likened the Democrats' criticism of his administration's response to the new coronavirus outbreak to their efforts to impeach him, saying ‘this is their new hoax.’” https://t.co/B1g7bbs7Pa
